section.title: EVMDatastoreList
section.para: EVMDatastoreList retrieves all of the id and name values of the Datastore instances stored in the VMDB.

listitem.para: Output: VMdbWs..DatastoreListArray. Each VmdbwsSupport..DatastoreList object contains the guid and name of a Datastore.

formalpara.title: Examples
formalpara.para: The following examples demonstrate EVMDatastoreList usage:

example.title: EVMDatastoreList WSDL
example.programlisting: <message name="EVMDatastoreList" /> <message name="EVMDatastoreListResponse"> <part name="return" type="typens: VmdbwsSupport..DatastoreListArray" /> </message> ... <xsd:complexType name="VmdbwsSupport..DatastoreList"> <xsd:all> <xsd:element name="id" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="name" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:all> </xsd:complexType>

example.title: EVMDatastoreList Output (PowerShell)
example.screen:
Datastores:
id name -- ---- 8 StarM1-Test2 7 StarM1-TestProd 6 StarM1-Dev 5 StarM2-Test 4 StarM1-vCloud_Test 3 StarM1-Test 2 local-dev 1 Thecus-N7700
